messages.title: Real life story
messages.content: Vikki knows a thing or two about apprenticeships, having seen the benefits apprenticeships have had to her business. It is no wonder she is campaigning to double the number of apprenticeships locally.

messages.title: £8 billion a year extra for the NHS
messages.content: The Lib Dems are pledging to increase funding on the NHS by £8 billion a year and outline reforms to keep costs from skyrocketing.

messages.title: It's a two horse race in Mid Dorset and North Poole
messages.content: Whatsoever else happens across Britain, the battle in Mid Dorset and North Poole will be a close contest between the Lib Dems and Conservatives.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Vikki Slade is determined to double the number of apprenticeships locally.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Balancing the budget - bringing down Britain's debt
keyPolicies.policyDescription: The Liberal Democrats are committed to balancing the budget by 2018 and bring down Britain's debt. They believe it is fair to future generations and essential to maintaining the UK's economic credibility.
The Lib Dems are strong on border controls with exit checks to know who is coming in and leaving the UK.

mentions.tacticalSituation: It's a two horse race in Mid Dorset and North Poole between the Lib Dems and Conservatives.

issues.economy: Balancing the books - bringing down Britain's debt
issues.health: £8 billion a year extra for the NHS

housing.content: Vikki is campaigning to increase the number of apprenticeships in Mid Dorset and North Poole.

leaflet.personalStatement: My plan for a stronger economy and fairer society in Mid Dorset and North Poole

politicalExperience.achievements: Vikki owns a small business locally.

endorsements.endorsement: I believe Vikki Slade is the best, local choice.

quotes.text: Apprenticeships offer young people real choice.
Vikki is the best, local choice.
Balancing the books - My plan for a stronger economy and fairer society in Mid Dorset and North Poole.
